title: pls change my region
body: pls change my region to latino america del norte

replies.body:
It looks like your account is level 2. Since region transfers cost real money, it may make more sense to create a new account on the Latin America North server from the [**LAN League of Legends page**](http://lan.leagueoflegends.com/).

If you have any other questions, let me know. ^.^

> [{quoted}](name=more123,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=1so9OqmX,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-02-24T02:15:11.507+0000)
>
> pls change my region to latino eu west
